 Artists: Camel

          Guy LeBlanc - keyboards, organ, moog, piano
          Colin Bass - bass
          Denis Clement - drums, percussion, bass, keyboards   
 Title: The Snow Goose
 Genre: Progressive Rock, Instrumental Rock
 Released: 2013

 Artists Country: the UK (England)
 Source: CDDA
 Audio Codec: FLAC (.flac)
 Bitrate: lossless
 Format: tracks / .cue / log / full artwork

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Announcement from Camel Productions' website:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 In celebration of Camel's return to centre stage, The Snow Goose has been
 lovingly re-recorded.
 This recording stands as a tribute to former bandmates Peter Bardens, Andy Ward
 and Doug Ferguson and remains steadfastly faithful to the original work.  With
 atmospheric arrangements and enhancements for stage presentation, The Snow Goose
 is not only a timeless story of love and war.  It is a tale of dignity and
 kindness lifted to the heart on the wings of an injured Snow Goose through her
 unique relationship with two humans. Written by Paul Gallico, this short story
 inspired this beautiful music.
